languages.text: {n}Маражай рывком поднимает голову: и без того худое лицо обтянуто сизо-белой пергаментной кожей, губы растянуты в судорожном оскале, а темные глаза превратились в два залитых чернотой зеркала, в которых, кажется, можно увидеть самого себя. Друкари открывает рот — однако вместо слов вы слышите неестественное сиплое шипение. Если в этом создании и был когда-то разум, сейчас от него не осталось ни единого следа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай рывком поднимает голову: и без того худое лицо обтянуто сизо-белой пергаментной кожей, губы растянуты в судорожном оскале, а темные глаза превратились в два залитых чернотой зеркала, в которых, кажется, можно увидеть самого себя. Друкари открывает рот — однако вместо слов вы слышите неестественное сиплое шипение. Если в этом создании и был когда-то разум, сейчас от него не осталось ни единого следа.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head up when you appear. His already gaunt face is tightly wrapped in pale grey, parchment-like skin, his teeth are bared feverishly, and his dark eyes have turned into two pitch-black mirrors that could show your reflection clearly if you were to gaze into them. He opens his mouth, but instead of words, an unnatural, rasping hiss comes out. If this creature ever possessed intelligence, there is no sign of it left.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай рывком поднимает голову: и без того худое лицо обтянуто сизо-белой пергаментной кожей, губы растянуты в судорожном оскале, а темные глаза превратились в два залитых чернотой зеркала, в которых, кажется, можно увидеть самого себя. Друкари открывает рот — однако вместо слов вы слышите неестественное сиплое шипение. Если в этом создании и был когда-то разум, сейчас от него не осталось ни единого следа.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head up when you appear. His already gaunt face is tightly wrapped in pale-grey, parchment-like skin, his teeth are bared feverishly, and his dark eyes have turned into two pitch black mirrors that could show your reflection clearly if you were to gaze in them. He opens his mouth, but instead of words, an unnatural, rasping hiss comes out. If this creature ever had an intelligence, there is no sign of it left.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

His already gaunt face is tightly wrapped in pale grey, parchment-like skin, his teeth are bared feverishly, and his dark eyes have turned into two pitch-black mirrors that could show your reflection clearly if you were to gaze into them. He opens his mouth, but instead of words, an unnatural, rasping hiss comes out. If this creature ever possessed intelligence, there is no sign of it left.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai lève brusquement la tête à votre arrivée. La peau de son visage, d'ordinaire décharné, est plus parcheminée que jamais et affiche un teint gris pâle. Ses lèvres retroussées comme par un spasme laissent apparaître ses dents, et ses yeux sont comme deux miroirs d'un noir de jais ; si vous osiez approcher, vous pourriez certainement y voir votre reflet. Il ouvre la bouche comme pour parler, mais ne fait que pousser un sifflement rauque et sinistre. Ce que vous avez devant vous n'a plus rien d'une créature douée d'intelligence.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head up when you appear. His already gaunt face is tightly wrapped in pale grey, parchment-like skin, his teeth are bared feverishly, and his dark eyes have turned into two pitch-black mirrors that could show your reflection clearly if you were to gaze into them. He opens his mouth, but instead of words, an unnatural, rasping hiss comes out. If this creature ever possessed intelligence, there is no sign of it left.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai lève brusquement la tête à votre arrivée. La peau de son visage, d'ordinaire décharné, est plus parcheminée que jamais et affiche un teint gris pâle. Ses lèvres retroussées comme par un spasme laissent apparaître ses dents, et ses yeux sont comme deux miroirs d'un noir de jais ; si vous osiez approcher, vous pourriez certainement y voir votre reflet. Il ouvre la bouche comme pour parler, mais ne fait que pousser un sifflement rauque et sinistre. Ce que vous avez devant vous n'a plus rien d'une créature douée d'intelligence.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}あなたが姿を現すと、マラズハイはバッと顔をあげた。ただでさえやつれていた彼の顔は薄い灰色の羊皮紙のような皮膚にきつく包まれ、歯は興奮のせいでむき出ている。黒い目はふたつの真っ黒な鏡のようで、良く見るとあなたの姿がはっきりと反射して見えた。彼は口を開くが、言葉の代わりに不自然な、荒い唸り声が出てくる。この生き物が知性を持っていたのだとしても、その痕跡は残っていない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head up when you appear. His already gaunt face is tightly wrapped in pale grey, parchment-like skin, his teeth are bared feverishly, and his dark eyes have turned into two pitch-black mirrors that could show your reflection clearly if you were to gaze into them. He opens his mouth, but instead of words, an unnatural, rasping hiss comes out. If this creature ever possessed intelligence, there is no sign of it left.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが姿を現すと、マラズハイはバッと顔をあげた。ただでさえやつれていた彼の顔は薄い灰色の羊皮紙のような皮膚にきつく包まれ、歯は興奮のせいでむき出ている。黒い目はふたつの真っ黒な鏡のようで、良く見るとあなたの姿がはっきりと反射して見えた。彼は口を開くが、言葉の代わりに不自然な、荒い唸り声が出てくる。この生き物が知性を持っていたのだとしても、その痕跡は残っていない。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}当你出现时，玛拉斋猛地抬起了头。他憔悴不已的脸惨白如纸，狂暴地露出了尖牙。他的黑眼睛仿佛变成了两块漆黑的镜子，当你凝视他的时候，可以清楚地看到你自己的倒影。他张开了嘴，但什么都没有说，而是发出了古怪的嘶嘶声，非常刺耳。就算眼前的黑暗灵族曾经拥有智慧，此刻看起来也没有一丝理智的迹象。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head up when you appear. His already gaunt face is tightly wrapped in pale grey, parchment-like skin, his teeth are bared feverishly, and his dark eyes have turned into two pitch-black mirrors that could show your reflection clearly if you were to gaze into them. He opens his mouth, but instead of words, an unnatural, rasping hiss comes out. If this creature ever possessed intelligence, there is no sign of it left.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你出现时，玛拉斋猛地抬起了头。他憔悴不已的脸惨白如纸，狂暴地露出了尖牙。他的黑眼睛仿佛变成了两块漆黑的镜子，当你凝视他的时候，可以清楚地看到你自己的倒影。他张开了嘴，但什么都没有说，而是发出了古怪的嘶嘶声，非常刺耳。就算眼前的黑暗灵族曾经拥有智慧，此刻看起来也没有一丝理智的迹象。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai hebt ruckartig den Kopf, als du dich näherst. Sein ohnehin schon hageres Gesicht ist straff von fahlgrauer, pergamentartiger Haut überzogen, seine Zähne sind fieberhaft gefletscht, und seine dunklen Augen haben sich in zwei pechschwarze Spiegel verwandelt, in denen du dich kristallklar abgebildet sehen könntest, würdest du in sie blicken. Er öffnet den Mund, doch statt Worten ertönt nur ein unnatürliches, keuchendes Zischen. Wenn diese Kreatur jemals Intelligenz besessen hat, ist davon nichts mehr übrig.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head up when you appear. His already gaunt face is tightly wrapped in pale grey, parchment-like skin, his teeth are bared feverishly, and his dark eyes have turned into two pitch-black mirrors that could show your reflection clearly if you were to gaze into them. He opens his mouth, but instead of words, an unnatural, rasping hiss comes out. If this creature ever possessed intelligence, there is no sign of it left.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai hebt ruckartig den Kopf, als du dich näherst. Sein ohnehin schon hageres Gesicht ist straff von fahlgrauer, pergamentartiger Haut überzogen, seine Zähne sind fieberhaft gefletscht, und seine dunklen Augen haben sich in zwei pechschwarze Spiegel verwandelt, in denen du dich kristallklar abgebildet sehen könntest, würdest du in sie blicken. Er öffnet den Mund, doch statt Worten ertönt nur ein unnatürliches, keuchendes Zischen. Wenn diese Kreatur jemals Intelligenz besessen hat, ist davon nichts mehr übrig.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Marazhai levanta la cabeza bruscamente cuando apareces. Su ya de por sí demacrado rostro tiene la piel muy tensa, lívida y con aspecto de pergamino; enseña los dientes presa de un delirio febril, y sus ojos oscuros son ahora como dos espejos negros en los que podrías reflejarte con nitidez si te mirases en ellos. Abre la boca, pero en vez de palabras lo que brota es un bufido ronco y antinatural. Si esta criatura poseyó inteligencia alguna vez, no queda rastro alguno de ella.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head up when you appear. His already gaunt face is tightly wrapped in pale grey, parchment-like skin, his teeth are bared feverishly, and his dark eyes have turned into two pitch-black mirrors that could show your reflection clearly if you were to gaze into them. He opens his mouth, but instead of words, an unnatural, rasping hiss comes out. If this creature ever possessed intelligence, there is no sign of it left.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai levanta la cabeza bruscamente cuando apareces. Su ya de por sí demacrado rostro tiene la piel muy tensa, lívida y con aspecto de pergamino; enseña los dientes presa de un delirio febril, y sus ojos oscuros son ahora como dos espejos negros en los que podrías reflejarte con nitidez si te mirases en ellos. Abre la boca, pero en vez de palabras lo que brota es un bufido ronco y antinatural. Si esta criatura poseyó inteligencia alguna vez, no queda rastro alguno de ella.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC

languages.text: {n}Yaklaştığını gören Marazhai, başını kaldırıyor. Zaten cılız olan yüzü; solgun gri, parşömene benzer bir deriyle kaplı. Kasılıyormuşçasına birbirinden ayrılmış dudakları, dişlerini açığa çıkarmış; kara gözleriyse baktığında yansımanı görebileceğin bir çift simsiyah aynaya dönüşmüş. Açık ağzından doğal olmayan, rahatsız edici bir tıslamadan başka bir şey çıkmıyor. Bu yaratık, bir zamanlar akıl sahibiydiyse bile artık o hâlinden eser kalmamış.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai jerks his head up when you appear. His already gaunt face is tightly wrapped in pale grey, parchment-like skin, his teeth are bared feverishly, and his dark eyes have turned into two pitch-black mirrors that could show your reflection clearly if you were to gaze into them. He opens his mouth, but instead of words, an unnatural, rasping hiss comes out. If this creature ever possessed intelligence, there is no sign of it left.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yaklaştığını gören Marazhai başını kaldırıyor. Zaten cılız olan yüzü, solgun, gri renkteki, parşömene benzer bir deriyle sıkıca sarmalanmış; dişleri hummalı bir şekilde açıkta kalmış ve kara gözleri, onlara baktığında yansımanı görebileceğin bir çift zifiri karanlık aynaya dönüşmüş. Ağzını açıyor ancak doğa dışı, rahatsız edici bir tıslamadan başka bir şey çıkmıyor. Bu yaratık bir zamanlar akıl sahibi bir şey idiyse bile, artık ondan eser kalmamış.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanionNPC
